sentences.en: Cattle were grazing on the meadow.
Cows were grazing in the field.
Cows were grazing on the marshes.
He had nearly a thousand acres of grazing and arable land.
sentences.cn: 他有将近1,000公顷的草场和耕地。

sentences.en: He will need more grazing land and perhaps La Prade could lease him a few acres.
sentences.cn: 他将需要更多牧场，也许拉普拉德可以租几英亩地给他。

sentences.en: Horses are grazing in the pasture.

sentences.cn: 我数了数，有34只野山羊在啃草。

sentences.en: Lawsuits involving property rights and farming and grazing rights increased markedly.
sentences.cn: 涉及财产权,耕作与放牧权的诉讼案件显著地增加.

sentences.en: Scientists have found the bones of a hoofed grazing animal about the size of a small horse.
sentences.cn: 科学家们已经发现了一种约有马驹般大小的有蹄草食性动物的骨骼。

sentences.en: The cattle are grazing in the field.
The cattle were grazing in the fields.
The cows are out now, grazing in the pasture.
sentences.cn: 牛现在已经放出去了，正在牧场上吃草。

sentences.en: There we saw herds of cows grazing on the pasture.
sentences.cn: 我们在那里看到一群群的牛在草地上吃草.

sentences.en: There were cows grazing beside the river.
We're grazing the sheep in the next field.
sentences.cn: 我们正在旁边一块地里放羊.

words.tran_cn: 放牧人；畜牧业者；牧场主
擦过；放牧（graze的过去分词）；抓破

phrases.tran_cn: 入射余角；掠射角；切线角
掠入射；切线入射；临界入射

trans.tran_en: Grazing or grazing land is land on which animals graze

trans.tran_cn: （让动物）吃草( graze的现在分词 )，轻擦，擦破，擦过，掠过
